recipes.name: Greek Rice Pudding
recipes.ingredients_raw_str: ["2       eggs, beaten ","3   ounces    vanilla pudding mix, cook and serve type ","1/2  cup    sugar","14   ounces    condensed milk","29   ounces    water, use 2 condensed milk measures ","2   cups    cooked rice"]
recipes.steps: ['In a medium saucepan combine, eggs, pudding mix, sugar and condensed milk.', 'Mix well.', 'Add water, then rice.', 'Bring to a boil over medium low heat, stirring constantly to prevent burning.', 'Remove from heat.', 'Cool at room temperature.']

recipes.name: Pumpkin or Squash Pie
recipes.ingredients_raw_str: ["1   cup    pumpkin or 1   cup    squash","1/2  cup    brown sugar","1/4  cup    molasses","1   tablespoon    butter","1   teaspoon    nutmeg","1   teaspoon    cinnamon","1/2  teaspoon    ginger","3/4  teaspoon    salt","2       eggs","1   cup    evaporated milk"]
recipes.steps: ['Mix all ingredients and beat together with a mixer.  pour into pastry lined pie pan.', 'Bake at 425F for about 20 minutes, then at 375F for 20-25 minutes.', 'Serve warm or cold with whipped cream.']

recipes.name: Toffee Almond Biscotti
recipes.ingredients_raw_str: ["2   cups    all-purpose flour","1   cup    granulated sugar","1   teaspoon    baking powder","1/8  teaspoon    salt","3   large    eggs","2   tablespoons    Amaretto or 1 1/2  teaspoons    almond extract","1   teaspoon    vanilla extract","3/4  cup    slivered almonds","3/4  cup    toffee pieces"]
recipes.steps: ['Preheat oven to 300 degrees F.', 'Line cookie sheet with parchment paper; set aside.', 'In a medium bowl, whisk together flour, baking powder, salt, sugar, almonds, and toffee bits; set aside.', 'In a large bowl, beat together eggs, Amaretto, and vanilla extract with an electric mixer.', 'Mix in dry ingredients with eggs, mix until combined. Dough will be sticky, but do not add more flour.', 'Flour surface of parchment paper lined cookie sheet, roll dough out on surface into a log about 3 inches in diameter.', 'Bake about 50 minutes, or until firm and dry.', 'Remove from oven and let cool for 10 minutes.', 'Use a serrated knife and cut into 1/2-inch slices.', 'Lay slices cut side down on cookie sheet and return to even for 20 minutes.', 'Remove from oven and turn slices over and bake another 20 minutes.']
